reuters.title: MOODY'S MAY UPGRADE SCI HOLDINGS' 1.45 BILLION DLRS OF DEBT
reuters.body: Boeing Co said the Hart-Scott-Rodino waiting period required in connection with its pending tender offer for ArgoSystems Inc <ARGI.O> expired at midnight June 18. Boeing began its 37 dlr per share cash tender offer for the defense electronics firm on June two. Reuter 
